header.rec_loc: at the home of ANONâ€™s friends in Kenilworth England, after work.
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: texting, how to respond to a text, food, work, phones, business, money, tv, films.
header.activity: Eating snacks together as a couple discussing films.

body.u: I'll let you plug your thing back I need to reply now I've read the message
oh sorry I've just got home erm how has your day been? sorry that I've been unable to reply
what do you fancy? Pepsi Max it's a big warm orange juice coke that's in a can
go on a can of Coke I don't usually drink cos it's full fat but it's probably better for me than all the other chemicals
and I'll drink it through a straw as well
uhu can I try one of these bubble gum things? whatever they are
yeah it's not bubble gum but yeah
oh yeah god those ones yeah
nasty what they are probably wanna find something to spit it out there you go spit it out into my erm wrapper
shit I swallowed half of it it's too crumbly to be bubble gum
not but but too small to be bubble gum you have to be like ten
see it's how instant the reply is as well er just the like ha a quick chats plus I'll open up every time I can see what is talking about er put your phone in and then I I can have my can of Coke
shall we put the TV on?
yeah oh excuse me these Hi-Chews are really nice I dunno if they have the new flavour or something
it says new strawberry but they've got a white bit in the middle
how much were they? you don't remember do you?
I've probably got a card receipt somewhere I think I spent four pound in the shop but I got two cans a bottle and these
they had loads of other flavours as well
and there's mango or anything cool?

I didn't think to look I can't quite remember off the top of my head but I was just like oh my god strawberry and it looks like Hi-Chew I'm gonna get it in case it is Hi-Chew and if not oh well I've got some chewing gum see what I mean? it's not like
what are they saying now? do you wanna put my phone over there and yours here?
okay there's not really much I can revise that any more
er they're gonna start scheduling these market craft markets out of one every month at and have it as a regular thing not just a but we're having a market next week
no but erm you should probably reply just for a few to show that
so reply to that one go oh that that would be erm with them bringing in more business regular customers all that
this TV's so useless let's turn on cos there's that stupid bit of
merry Christmas thing in the way so you gotta try and angle it round it okay then what are we going on? Netflix or
you quite liked that film didn't you?
you quite like the Pineapple Express don't you?
oh god sorry sitting it's taking so long to get into these
I know it's a really tough packet
some of them are like some of my favourites from
there's the mm do you ever watch Luther?
yeah I did with my parents
oh god it was so good
haven't seen Air Command Two is it any good?
it only got two star what else is there?
apparently that's just a really brutal arse film like incredibly violent
what was that film with that actress that everyone things is really hot? MMegan Fox there was a film and it was like a was it Megan Fox?
erm there's a really cool song in that I watched it once erm I can't remember what the song is and I couldn't find it anywhere I can't remember what it was called that looks atrocious
oh you haven't seen that cos you don't like puppets
it's so funny they make the puppets have sex in one point
didn't we try and half watch that once?
that's funny you haven't seen that have you?
we watched it once didn't we?
I know I watched I dunno if you were with me and we and the piss-take version of Narnia
it's a it's a about I don't know
you spend more time looking for something to watch on Netflix don't you than actually watching it
yeah wanna look in a different section maybe?
new releases maybe oh is there the new ?
then why is it on new releases?
that's something you'd be into anima girls in revealing like clothes that was not very good but can't stop watching it kind of thing until you realise that you should probably
haven't even seen the first one
I don't really know to be honest I'm really tired
me too oh no is that no it's not is it?
is that supposed to be a a good film?
three and a half stars I've heard people talk about it before
they made the TV series of that it's gonna be a bit better than the shit that was maybe funny as well
she spent er there you go and so it's got a funny camp gay black guy in it
yeah? why was she trapped underground?
I will imagine that will be revealed in the programme
ah oh Christmassy ah oh cute
cult leader apprehended whilst acting weird at Omaha

can you hear the music from here?
he will give permission for this won't he?
he'll give permission for this won't he?
well if not I'll delete it
mm what was it? we can carry on yum yum these are good yeah he woke up when we left
which was earlyish it was about ten wasn't it? but before ten
you say woke up he was collapsed on that chair
but didn't go to sleep so he had five hours' sleep and then still managed to go out last night and then
